properties.entry: CREATE TABLE meandre_server_status (ID CHAR(16), status CHAR(1) default 'D', updated BIGINT default 0, previous_updated BIGINT default 0, uptime REAL default 0, free_memory REAL default 0, failed_updates INTEGER default 0, ts timestamp, PRIMARY KEY(ID))

CREATE TABLE meandre_server_info (ID CHAR(16), ip CHAR(15) default '127.0.0.1', server_name CHAR(40) default 'localhost', port INTEGER default 1714, server_description CHAR(80) default 'unknown', memory_available BIGINT, number_processors INTEGER, os_arch VARCHAR(40), os_name VARCHAR(40), os_version VARCHAR(40), java_version VARCHAR(20), java_vm_version VARCHAR(20), java_vm_vendor VARCHAR(40), local_user_name VARCHAR(20), user_home VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY(ID))

CREATE TABLE meandre_server_log (ID CHAR(16), status CHAR(1) default 'D', uptime REAL default 0, failed_updates INTEGER default 0, ip CHAR(15) default '127.0.0.1', server_name CHAR(40) default 'localhost', port INTEGER default 1714, server_description CHAR(80) default 'unknown', memory_available BIGINT, number_processors INTEGER, os_arch VARCHAR(40), os_name VARCHAR(40), os_version VARCHAR(40), java_version VARCHAR(20), java_vm_version VARCHAR(20), java_vm_vendor VARCHAR(40), local_user_name VARCHAR(20), user_home VARCHAR(255), ts TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE meandre_server_properties (ID CHAR(40), value VARCHAR(128), PRIMARY KEY (ID))
